title: Is an ACST scholarship given by Aakash less than an ANTHE scholarship? - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships

response.answer_text: Yes, an ACST scholarship is less than the ANTHE scholarship. I had enterred Aakash through ACST scholarship of 10%. They give you the scholarship based on your ACST result. The exam is of 100 marks with no negative marking. The least scholarship you can expect is 10% and the most of 35%. While an ANTHE scholarship gives you discount upto 55% based on the results of ANTHE test. Work hard on your basics and you can easily get upto 30% scholarship via ACST.
